messages.title: We Deserve Better Than This Brexit Mess
messages.content: "Millions of Tories will now vote Lib Dem because of Brexit" - Former Conservative MP Michael Heseltine

messages.title: Stop Damaging Development
messages.content: New housing needs to be lower carbon and affordable... We let down future generations if new housing isn’t built to the highest green standards.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Oppose Brexit to build a future that will restore the country’s leadership and prosperity.
Save our community hospitals and ensure local NHS funding.
Stronger laws to stop climate change, promote sustainability, and protect the natural world.

issues.brexitEurope: We deserve better than this Brexit mess.
issues.economy: Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the privileged few.
issues.health: Invest in schools and our NHS.

community.content: Stop damaging development. New housing needs to be lower carbon and affordable.

politicalExperience.achievements: Experience, passion, and determination. Leading environmentalist and campaigner with many years fighting for nature, wildlife, and green development.

endorsements.endorsement: "Millions of Tories will now vote Lib Dem because of Brexit"

images.caption: Vote for a brighter future with the Liberal Democrats

examples: Residents showed their opposition to new developments across the Wantage constituency when they voted most Conservative Councillors out in last May’s local elections.
Result here at the 2019 Euro Election: Con 9%, Brexit 33%, LibDem 38%
We let down future generations if new housing isn’t built to the highest green standards.
Leading environmentalist and campaigner.
Good quality, low-carbon, affordable housing.
Stronger laws to stop climate change, promote sustainability, and protect the natural world.
Labour cannot win here.
Forcing an unsustainable development at Chalgrove.
Taking action to build a future that works for everyone.
Save our community hospitals.
Stop damaging development.
Help our market towns thrive.
Local Lib Dem Richard Benwell

We deserve better than this Brexit mess.
